com.mousebird.maply

Class BaseInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.BaseInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BillboardInfo, LabelInfo, MarkerInfo, ShapeInfo, StickerInfo, VectorInfo

    public class BaseInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base class for all the various Info objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean disposeAfterUse
      If set, the toolkit will dispose of the objects that were added after it's finished.
      protected long nativeHandle

    • Field Detail

      • disposeAfterUse

        public boolean disposeAfterUse
        If set, the toolkit will dispose of the objects that were added after it's finished. This saves memory by removing the C++ data for things like VectorObjects.

      • nativeHandle

        protected long nativeHandle

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseInfo

        protected BaseInfo()

    • Method Detail

      • setEnable

        public void setEnable(boolean newEnable)
        Controls whether or not the geometry will be visible. By default this is true.
        Parameters:
        newEnable - New value for the enable.

      • setDrawOffset

        public void setDrawOffset(float drawOffset)
        Set the drawOffset for geometry. This is rarely used.

      • setDrawPriority

        public void setDrawPriority(int drawPriority)
        Set the drawPriority for the geometry. Draw priority controls the order in which features are drawn.

      • getDrawPriority

        public int getDrawPriority()
        Get the drawPriority for the geometry. Draw priority controls the order in which features are drawn.

      • setMinVis

        public void setMinVis(float minVis)
        Set the minimum cutoff for visibility of the feature. This is the closest height the feature will be visible from. Defaults to 0.0 (always visible).

      • getMinVis

        public float getMinVis()
        Returns the minimum cutoff for visibility of the feature. This is the closest height the feature will be visible from. Defaults to 0.0 (always visible).

      • setMaxVis

        public void setMaxVis(float maxVis)
        Set the maximum cutoff for visibility of the features. This is the biggest height the features will be visible from. Defaults to off.

      • getMaxVis

        public float getMaxVis()
        Returns the maximum cutoff for visibility of the features. This is the biggest height the features will be visible from. Defaults to off.

      • setFade

        public void setFade(float fade)
        The amount of time (in seconds) it takes for new geometry to fade in and fade out. By default, fade is off.

      • getFade

        public float getFade()
        The amount of time (in seconds) it takes for new geometry to fade in and fade out. By default, fade is off.

      • setShader

        public void setShader(Shader shader)
        Set the shader to be used in rendering the given objects.
